participant_1.background:
I live in the Midwest with my family, but I like to spend time alone sometimes.
I'm nervous about my first day of safety patrol.
i have three tattoos.
I am proud of my ability to take care of myself and my cats.
I'd brag to my friends about my massive collection of foreign films.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy picking wild strawberries with my son on our weekend camping trips.
I am a hard worker, and I don't let my height get in the way of my work.
Others will be inspired by my work and see that it is possible to make a living doing what you love, even if you didn't go to college.
i used to wear a cape.
my guilty pleasure is mcdonald.

content.text: Not much, just hanging out. What's up with you?
I'm doing well. Just got back from a weekend camping trip.
Sounds fun! Did you do any hiking or fishing?
We did a little bit of both. It was a great time.
That's awesome. I'm glad you had a good time.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to doing it again soon.
Me too. I love camping. It's so relaxing and peaceful.
Yeah, it is. It's also a great way to spend time with family and friends.
I agree. I love going camping with my son. We always have a lot of fun.
That's awesome. I'm glad you have a good time with your son.
That's great. I'm glad you have a good relationship with him.
Me too. He's the light of my life.
That's sweet. I'm sure he feels the same way about you.
